main event: Observers watched a group of several objects about the size of large birds or small airplanes for nearly 20 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were white, red and green, and appeared to be the color 'reported by others' as observed during similar sightings in the area.
The objects appeared to be moving and maneuvering in a somewhat erratic manner and one appeared to disappear and reappear in a different location.
A strong temperature inversion from 0' to 5,000 ft existed at the time of the sighting, which was the probable cause of this sighting.
The sighting lasted for about 15 to 20 minutes.
sighted object: several white, red and green objects about the size of large birds or small airplanes
witnesses: Manistee Coast Guard Station, Manistee, Michigan
